```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
data("mtcars")
library(modelr)
library(tidyverse)
```
Here is a summary of mtcars.
```{r}
summary(mtcars)
```









Here is a plot of mpg as a function of hp.
```{r,message=FALSE,fig.align='center',fig.width=3,fig.height=2}
ggplot(mtcars,aes(x=hp,y=mpg))+geom_point()+geom_smooth(method = lm)
```
```{r}
mod1 <- glm(data = mtcars,formula = mpg~hp)
mod2 <- glm(data = mtcars,formula = mpg~poly(hp,2))
```

```{r}
gather_predictions(mtcars,mod1,mod2)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=hp))
```
